title: Animals: General (Usefulness 1-5)
description: Traveler usefulness 1-5/10 phrases for the General subcategory within Animals. Includes 8 card(s).

cards.english: There is a cat under the table.
cards.romaji: T.buru no shita ni neko ga imasu.
cards.japanese: テーブルの下に猫がいます。

cards.english: The sea turtle is swimming in the sea.
cards.romaji: Umigame ga umi o oyoide iru.
cards.japanese: 海亀が海を泳いでいる。

cards.english: The brown rabbit is eating leaves in the garden.
cards.romaji: Chairoi usagi ga niwa de happa o tabete iru.
cards.japanese: 茶色い兎が庭で葉っぱを食べている。

cards.english: The “shibaken” is a Japanese breed of dog which has always been one of the most popular with Japanese people.
cards.romaji: Shibaken to iu inu wa, tsune ni Nihon-jin ni ninki no aru Nihonken desu.
cards.japanese: 柴犬という犬は、常に日本人に人気のある日本犬です。

cards.english: Turtles are said to live for 10,000 years.
cards.romaji: Kame wa ichi-man-nen ikiru to iwarete imasu.
cards.japanese: 亀は一万年生きると言われています。

cards.english: In Japan, monkeys also enjoy hot natural springs in winter.
cards.romaji: Nihon de wa, fuyu ni saru mo onsen o tanoshimimasu.
cards.japanese: 日本では、冬に猿も温泉を楽しみます。

cards.english: The monkeys are eating ants with a stick.
cards.romaji: Saru ga b. de ari o tsukamaete tabete iru.
cards.japanese: 猿が棒で蟻を捕まえて食べている。
